headline: JPMorgan Faces Crypto Clash And Trump Lawsuit As Valuation Draws Focus
summary: At Davos, JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon publicly challenged Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong over stablecoin rewards and regulatory clarity. The exchange underscored growing tension between large banks and crypto platforms competing for deposits and payments activity. Separately, former President Donald Trump filed a $5b lawsuit accusing JPMorgan of politically motivated account closures. Both developments raise fresh questions around JPMorgan's role in digital assets and its exposure to...
